Text.Page:
Looks like we need you to head into the Dark Cathedralâ€”and by the looks of this list, you may as well just never put that weapon of yours away. You may want to take notes.

You're after {@LinkCreature:25#1081#remorseless hyenas}, {@LinkCreature:25#1041#dread squires}, {@LinkCreature:25#1021#devan pelates}, {@LinkCreature:25#1022#skeletal wardens}, {@LinkCreature:25#1031#dread knights}, {@LinkCreature:25#1032#skeletal defenders}, and {@LinkCreature:25#1051#skeletal pikemen}.

Got all that? Good, because I don't know that I can spew that list again.

Meet up with Essunia when you're done.
That's showing them what the federation can do! Keep it up!
